wiki.content: According to the It Hurts So Good Songfacts, this was written by Philip Mitchell, who is a soul singer that wrote for many other artists in the early '70s. It was originally recorded by Millie Jackson and her version was featured in the movie Cleopatra Jones. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: According to the It Hurts So Good Songfacts, this was written by Philip Mitchell, who is a soul singer that wrote for many other artists in the early '70s. It was originally recorded by Millie Jackson and her version was featured in the movie Cleopatra Jones.

track.name: Hurt So Good
comments: what a tune, good grief. brings back memories
yes i know.it hurts so good.and it's all right with me.
There is a great live version she does with NYC hipsters The Slackers.  This is tight too!
Long time no hear!  Love it
Takes me back a few decades Love it love it!!!
just a great song love it :)
I haven't heard this song in years!  Thank you Last.Fm!!
Susan Cadogan makes me hurt so good!
hurts so good!!!!... Used to dance to this as a child!!
